titles: Episcopall inheritance, or, A reply to the humble examination of a printed abstract of the answers to nine reasons of the Hovse of Commons against the votes of bishops in Parliament also a determination of the learned and reverend bishop of Sarum Englished.
author: Langbaine, Gerard, 1609-1658.
notes: Attributed to Gerard Langbaine.  cf. BLC.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
keywords: Burges, Cornelius, 1589?-1665. --  Humble examination of a printed abstract.
